New Records: The Detroit Tigers erased a three-run deficit to defeat the Tampa Bay Rays 4-3, moving one step closer to their first playoff appearance since 2014.
Key Match Events: The Tigers rallied to win the game, coming back from a three-run deficit.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory moved the Tigers one step closer to their first playoff appearance since 2014.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit.
